content: Claims analysis shows 78% of patients with UNIQUE_FACT bilateral meniscal repairs at Glen Oaks Medical Center between April-September 2023 were aged 30-45 and participated in recreational sports. EVENT_DATE 2023-08-15 audit identified 12 cases requiring additional documentation for POLICY_DOCUMENT ORTHO-2023-07 compliance, all subsequently resolved by EVENT_DATE 2023-09-01.
